## Events.CommentBase.CommentCreateDeleteHelper() method

Helper function for Comment\[Create\|Delete\]

**Signature:**


|  Parameter | Type | Description |

|  event | [CommentCreate](./blockly.events.commentcreate.md) \| [CommentDelete](./blockly.events.commentdelete.md) | The event to run. |
